item.description:
Afternoon Tea at Taj Boston Hotel

 

Ever noticed in the old-fashion movies where the English people are having their fancy Victorian TEA TIME? Now we can do the same thing at the Taj Boston. Tea will be serve with fine china and everyone gets their individual teapot, cream, rock sugar, and all. Price ranges from $16 - $33 depending on what you get. Ladies and gentlemen feel free to dress up a little (at least something nice) since this a traditional tea time and its Valentine weekend ;). There is only limited room, so please ONLY RSVP if you can make it. Many cheers......
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the hotel lobby at 1:45 PM (the entrance is at the corner of Newbury St, intersecting Arlington St, next to Boston garden.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Afternoon Tea at Taj Boston Hotel
